Controller - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller
Controls sequence of events between block detection, navigation, obstacle avoidance, and zipline traversal.

Constructor of the class Controller which uses the parameters to instantiate the classes which will be controlled
convertAngle(double, double, double) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller.Navigation
Method that converts angle to rotate by to required wheel rotations
convertDistance(double, double) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller.Navigation
